Bloons Tower Defense 2 is the 2007 sequel to the original BTD by Ninja Kiwi. In this classic tower defense game, players strategically place monkey towers to pop waves of balloons (bloons) before they escape.

What is Bloons Tower Defense 2?

BTD 2 expands the original gameplay with new maps, towers, and upgrades. The game features three maps and multiple difficulty levels, challenging players to adapt their strategy as waves of bloons get faster and more complex.

How to Play Bloons Tower Defense 2?

  • Place Towers: Position monkey dart towers, tack shooters, and more to stop bloons.
  • Upgrade: Spend cash to improve tower range, speed, and power.
  • Defend: Pop all bloons before they reach the end of the path.
  • Strategy: Different bloons (lead, camo, etc.) require different tower types.
